scenario_text.value: Whew! Looks like that’s all of them.
Thanks, Takuma...

I think I might go back to the school. Since
we can’t go to the mountains...

Might be best to go back and let everyone
know about the fog, too.
Let’s go.

Um... Remember how I said there are fewer
places to search now because of the fog?
Yeah, why?

Because Kaito might be in there somewhere...
But we shouldn’t think about that, right?
Saki...

(She’s right. There’s no use thinking about
Kaito being in the fog.)

(That would mean we can’t find him. And
I don’t wanna think about that.)

(But there’s no denying the possibility, and
that must terrify her.)
(What can I say to calm her down?)
Kaito’s not in the fog.
Don’t think the worst.
It’s possible.
He’s not in the fog.
It’s okay. Kaito’s not in the fog.
How can you be so sure?

He’s not here with us, but that doesn’t mean
he’s helpless.

I’m sure he snuck off for a reason. Maybe he
had something he wanted to do.
You think so? That does sound like him...

And he’s always on guard. No way he’d be
surprised by that fog.

He can’t be in there. There are fewer places
to search, so I’m sure we’ll find him.

That sounds about right! Isn’t that a relief,
Saki?
Yeah... Yeah, it is!

Okay, I’m gonna go back to the school and let
people know about the fog. Come on, Floramon!
Okay! See ya later, Takuma!
I’m glad you’re feeling better, Saki!
Yeah, me, too!

All right, let’s search a little more and
then head back ourselves.
Don’t think about it.

We can’t think about worst case scenarios.
That does nothing to prevent them.

True. We don’t have time to waste pondering
every possibility.

Anyway, it’s getting scary out here, so I’m
heading back! See ya later!
Let’s go, Floramon!
Yeah, let’s!

(Kaito out in the fog somewhere? That’s the
last thing I wanna think about...)
It’s possible.
It’s technically a possibility.
Yeah...

I was thinking it would be better not to
think about it, but still...

We have to consider the worst case scenario.
It’s not bad that it crossed your mind.
Ugh, I feel so scared all of a sudden.
I’m going back to the school. See you later!
Let’s go, Floramon!
Yeah, let’s!

(If Kaito is in the fog... Then he’s beyond
our help.)

(It’s all for nothing if we don’t make it
back together. Please be safe, Kaito!)
